summary: This bill, the Delivering On Government Efficiency in Spending Act, aims to improve the tracking and verification of federal payments. It mandates agencies to report information about payments to the Treasury, with exceptions for sensitive operations. It also provides Treasury access to the National Directory of New Hires and allows for bank account verification to prevent improper payments. The bill further enhances the 'Do Not Pay' working system by granting access to tax and Social Security information to prevent fraud.
